page.title: 17MEDIA
page.content: {MEDIA} The Area is well served by newspapers. Besides the national dailies there are two local weekly newspapers, the {Berrow's Journal,}based in Worcester and reputedly the world's oldest newspaper and the{Evesham Journal. Both papers cost about 25 pence and are published each Thursday. They have local Pershore editions which carry local news. A local radio station,{"Radio Wyvern", broadcasts to the area and struggles to attract advertising, its future being uncertain in a very competitive field. Several free papers are distributed: {"The Admag", "The Worcester Source" and a quarterly advertising paper{"The {Vale News". }All these publications are aimed at selling products rather than purveying news.
